snippet.title: Loco Motive - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/LocoMotiveSteam

Welcome aboard the Reuss Express, a journey of a life-time derailed by an unexpected assassination. Prove your innocence in this slapstick point and click adventure, full of twists, turns and wacky characters! 

Coming to Steam & Nintendo Switch in 2022. 
Developed by Robust Games. Published by Chucklefish.

http://www.locomotivegame.com
